verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: wants] [ARG1: to fire Attorney General Jeff Sessions and find a replacement to obstruct special counsel Robert Mueller ’s Russia investigation] . He might get EPA administrator Scott Pruitt through the Federal Vacancies Reform Act .
